plot: There's so many things we need in our childhood but now a days we are not getting them. Isn't there any side affect for that?
title: Bikrito Shoisob
plot_es: There's so many things we need in our childhood but now a days we are not getting them. Isn't there any side affect for that?
plot_en: There's so many things we need in our childhood but now a days we are not getting them. Isn't there any side affect for that?
